Adventure Guildsman: Welcome, friend! It's my job to gather information about fascinating -- and lucrative -- opportunities for adventure in this land. I would be honored to help match your skills to the appropriate venue. You have the look of a helpful soul... I know many poor folk in sore need of capable help. Are you game? What sort of adventure did you have in mind? [npc_%objectId%_questlist|Quest Information.] [npc_%objectId%_raidInfo 0|Raid Monster Information.] [npc_%objectId%_Quest|Quest.]
